meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Ed Brown Ariel Watkins Kelly Bayles Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7314.

td.p: Ed Brown, a lighting designer from Pasadena, California
Ariel Watkins, a graduate student from Monterey, California
Kelly Bayles, a librarian from Tulsa, Oklahoma (whose 1-day cash winnings total $16,900)

tr.td: TV MAPS
DRINKING VESSELS
ON THE INTERWEBS
IN HIS STATE OF THE UNION ADDRESS
OF COURSE
CRIME WAVE

tr.td: Kelly
Ariel
Ed
TAKE A LOOK AT THE MONITOR
VIRGINIA IS FOR WRITERS
PLOTS OF 1970s NO. 1 SONGS
(Alex: You identify the tune.)
ANTHROPOLOGY
IN THE CANADIAN PROVINCE
RHYME WAVE
(Alex: Each correct response in that category will rhyme with "wave".)
